mutants.original_line: words = seq.split('-')     # Split the sequence by hyphen to get the words
mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(seq):
    words = seq.split('')
    word_count = Counter(words)
    sorted_word_count = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_word_count

mutants.mutated_line: sorted_word_count = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=False)

mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(seq):
    words = seq.split('-')
    word_count = Counter(words)
    sorted_word_count = sorted(word_count.items(), key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_word_count
